channel.title: Crime on Tristan's website
channel.description: Recent content in Crime on Tristan's website

item.title: Pre-cog and stats
item.description: A cool article here on a group predicting the place/time when crime is going to happen. It looks like they are using a Poisson process. They liken it to predicting the after shocks of an earthquake. More details on the math behind the pre-cog software can be found here. I wonder what their prediction accuracy is? Thanks to Rafa for pointing the link out.
